metadata.title: CVE-2019-14528 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
GnuCOBOL 2.2 has a heap-based buffer overflow in read_literal in cobc/scanner.l via crafted COBOL source code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14528` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnucobol - 3.0~rc1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnucobol package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0~rc1-2').
